class  IListener

Detailed Description

This class loads and manages managed effects.

void Moo::EffectManager::addIncludePaths ( const std::string &  pathString  ) 

This method adds the includepaths from pathString to the include search path.

Parameters:
pathString the paths to add, paths can be separated by ;

void Moo::EffectManager::addListener ( IListener *  listener  ) 

Registers an EffectManager listener instance.

bool Moo::EffectManager::checkModified ( const std::string &  objectName,
const std::string &  resName,
MD5::Digest *  outResDigest = NULL 
)

This method checks if the specified resource file is modified.

Parameters:
objectName object file built from the resource file.
resName resource file.
outResDigest optional parameter, saves the MD5 hash digest of resName.
Returns:
true if the resource file or its includes has been updated and needs a recompile.

void Moo::EffectManager::compileOnly ( const std::string &  resourceID  ) 

As the name suggests, this only compiles a shader and discards the results.

Parameters:
resourceID the name of the effect to compile.

void Moo::EffectManager::delListener ( IListener *  listener  ) 

Unregisters an EffectManager listener instance.

bool Moo::EffectManager::finishEffectInits (  ) 

Runs finishInit on all un-initialised effect materials.

This function should only be called from the render thread.

void Moo::EffectManager::fxoInfix ( const std::string &  infix  ) 

Sets fxo file infix.

This infix is used when compiling the fx files to differentiate different compilation settings (most commonly different macro definition). It's currently used by the EffectMacroSetting.

const std::string & Moo::EffectManager::fxoInfix (  )  const

Returns fxo file infix.

resourceID the name of the effect to load
Returns:
smart pointer to the loaded effect

bool Moo::EffectManager::needRecompile ( const std::string &  resourceID  ) 

The method checks if the passed effect needs to be recompiled before it can be used.

NOTE: The effect if not compiled by this method, only a check is is performed to see if it would need recompilation.

Parameters:
resourceID the name of the effect to check.

EffectIncludes * Moo::EffectManager::pEffectIncludes (  ) 

This method returns the singleton's effect includes class.

Returns:
Pointer to the EffectInclude.

bool Moo::EffectManager::registerGraphicsSettings (  ) 

Runs through all loaded effect files, registering their graphics settings when relevant.

Returns:
False if application was quit during processing.
